data.name: Error.ACT1.Text
data.value:
License Activation failed. The license details provided do not match a valid license.

Verify your license details on your licenses page on www.DotNetNuke.com and try again. If you continue to have difficulties, please contact Technical Support.

data.name: Error.ACT2.Text
data.value: License activation failed. Production activation for {0} is in use.

data.name: Error.ACT3.Text
data.value: You have exceeded the limit of activations from this client address

data.name: Error.ACT4.Text
data.value: License activation failed. Production activation for {0} is in use.

data.name: Error.ACT6.Text
data.value: License activation failed. Your service period for this license expired on {0:d}. Please contact customercare@dnncorp.com.

data.name: Error.ContactServer.activate
data.value: Unable to activate license. Connection to license server failed. Please try again later or use manual activation. If you continue to have difficulties, please contact Technical Support.

data.name: Error.ContactServer.canrenew
data.value:
Connection to license server failed. You will not be able to automatically activate or renew licenses. You can use manual activation to activate a license.

For license renewal contact customercare@dnncorp.com.

data.name: Error.ContactServer.deactivate
data.value:
Your license was deleted.

Unable to add activation back to your invoice as Connection to license server failed. Please contact Technical Support for license activation.

data.name: Error.ContactServer.renew
data.value: Unable to Renew License. Connection to license server failed. Please try again later or contact customercase@dnncorp.com

data.name: Error.DEA1.Text
data.value: Delete License failed. The license was not found.

data.name: Error.ExpiredLicense
data.value: License activation failed. Your license expired on {0:d}. Check your licenses on your licenses page on www.DotNetNuke.com. Log in using the account you received when you first bought the product.

data.name: Error.LicenseAlreadyExists
data.value: License Activation failed. The host server {0} already has a {1} license.

data.name: Error.REN1.Text
data.value: Renew License failed. The license was not found.

data.name: Error.ServerUrl
data.value: Url for License server is missing.

data.name: Error.TrialActivation
data.value: Your extended trial license is not valid. Please ensure that you have pasted the complete value into the provided field. If you continue to experience difficulties please contact sales@dnncorp.com for assistance.

data.name: Error.TrialActivation.AlreadyInstalled
data.value: Your extended trial license has already been installed. If you continue to experience difficulties please contact sales@dnncorp.com for assistance.

data.name: Error.TrialExtensionRequest
data.value: Unable to send your request for a trial license extension. Your email server (SMTP) may not be setup or there was an error trying to send the email. Please call DotNetNuke Corp. Sales Dept. at 650-288-3150 for a trial license extension.

data.name: Error.Unknown
data.value: Unable to process request, please try again later.

data.name: Error.Unknown.Activation
data.value: Unable to process request, please try again later or use manual activation.

data.name: LicenseActivated.Text
data.value: Your license has been activated successfully.

data.name: LicenseErrorHost.Text
data.value: The module has not been activated or there is an issue with the license. Check your licenses on your licenses page on www.dotnetnuke.com. Log in using the account you received when you first purchased your license.

data.name: LicenseErrorUser.Text
data.value: There appears to be a licensing issue. Please log in as host to correct this.

data.name: LicenseExpired.Text
data.value: Your license expired on {0:d}. Check your licenses on your licenses page on www.DotNetNuke.com. Log in using the account you received when you first bought the product.

data.name: LicenseServiceExceeded.Text
data.value: Your service period for this license has expired on {0:d}. Check your licenses on your licenses page on www.DotNetNuke.com. Log in using the account you received when you first bought the product.

data.name: Success.DevLicenseActivated
data.value: Development License has been activated successfully.

data.name: Success.LicenseActivated
data.value: Production License has been activated successfully

data.name: Success.LicenseDeactivated
data.value: Your license has been deleted successfully.

data.name: Success.LicenseDeactivatedContactServerErr
data.value:
Your license was deleted.

Unable to add activation back to your invoice as Connection to license server failed. If you need to activate as a production license, please contact Technical Support.

data.name: Success.LicenseDeactivatedNoActivationIncrease
data.value:
Your license was deleted.

Unable to add activation back to the invoice. If you need to activate as a production license, please contact Technical Support.

data.name: Success.LicenseRenewed
data.value: Your license has been renewed successfully.

data.name: Success.TrialActivation
data.value: Your extended trial license has been successfully installed.

data.name: Success.TrialExtensionRequest
data.value: Your trial license extension request has been submitted. You should receive an email within 1 business day, with instructions for extending your license. If you have any questions about trial license extensions, please call DotNetNuke Corp. Sales Dept. at 650-288-3150.

data.name: ValidLocalHost.Text
data.value: This license is activated as a development license and is fully active using localhost.

data.name: Warning.DeleteLicense
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this license?

data.name: WebLicenseList.url
data.value: http://www.dotnetnuke.com/Resources/DotNetNukeSupportNetwork/LicenseManagement/tabid/1205/Default.aspx

data.name: WebLicenseRequest.url
data.value: http://www.dotnetnuke.com/Resources/DotNetNukeSupportNetwork/LicenseManagement/tabid/1205/ctl/RequestLicense/mid/3864/default.aspx

data.name: WebService.url
